long_description: your first choice for sustainability sourced & ethically produced high-quality apparel. thomas scott offers a line of casual clothing that's affordable, versatile, comfortable, and high-quality to bring you a modern wardrobe that lasts. elevate your everyday style with the power of self-expression, an attitude consistently reflected in our designs. all day, all seasons, all sizes. we're a premium menswear fashion brand that designs, manufactures and markets sustainable and ethically produced, high-quality apparel at accessible prices. at thomas scott, we're always striving to create smart casuals that are designed to last, look good and feel comfortable. over decades, thomas scott has evolved from a premium apparel brand under the reins of industry leader brijgopal bang to one that's environmentally conscious, online-first, and caters to the millennial audience, now led by qualified son vedant bang. we bring to you a modern wardrobe that lasts. at thomas scott, we don't believe in keeping secrets.
